about.historyText1: Ale Beauty Art was born in 2023 from a passion for authentic beauty and the desire to offer high-quality cosmetic products that enhance each person's natural beauty. From our humble beginnings as a small physical store, we have grown to become your reliable destination for cosmetics online.
about.historyText2: We combine traditional knowledge with the latest innovations in personal care to provide you with a comprehensive and personalized beauty experience.
about.missionText: To provide our customers with high-quality products that enhance their natural beauty and allow them to feel confident and radiant. We offer an exceptional shopping experience with a focus on customer satisfaction, authenticity, and constant innovation.
about.visionText: To be the leading beauty destination online, recognized for our quality, variety, and exceptional service. We aspire to empower each person to express their unique beauty through products that care for both their appearance and well-being.
about.makeupDescription: From foundations to lipsticks, everything to create perfect looks
about.hairDescription: Professional products for all hair types
about.qualityText: We rigorously select each product to ensure excellence and durability
about.authenticityText: All our products are 100% original with authenticity certificates
about.innovationText: Always at the forefront of the latest beauty trends and technologies
about.communityText: We believe beauty is diverse and we promote inclusion for all
about.storeTitle: We Also Have a Physical Store
about.storeDescription: In addition to our online store, we have a cozy physical location where you can experience the products personally, receive specialized advice from our team, and enjoy a unique shopping experience.
about.ctaTitle: Join the Ale Beauty Art Community
about.ctaDescription: Discover the beauty within you with products that really work

intro.part2: By accessing and using our online store for makeup, skincare products, hair care and cosmetics, you agree to comply with the following terms and conditions. We recommend that you read them carefully before making a purchase.

section1.title: 1. Use of the Site
section1.text: The website is intended for adults only. Use of the platform for fraudulent or illegal purposes is strictly prohibited.

section2.title: 2. Products
section2.text: We specialize in offering makeup, skincare products, hair treatments and high-quality cosmetics. However, product images are illustrative and may differ from the final product. We always recommend reviewing the description before making a purchase.

section3.title: 3. Prices and Payments
section3.text: All prices are shown in Colombian pesos (COP) and include applicable taxes. We reserve the right to modify prices without prior notice. Payments must be made through the payment methods enabled in the store.

section4.title: 4. Shipping and Delivery
section4.text: Orders are processed within 1 to 3 business days. Delivery times may vary depending on the destination city. We are not responsible for delays caused by the shipping company.

section5.title: 5. Returns
section5.text: For hygiene and safety reasons, returns are not accepted for makeup, skincare or cosmetics once opened or used. Returns will only be accepted for defective products or items shipped incorrectly.

section6.title: 6. User Responsibility
section6.text: It is the user's responsibility to read the instructions and ingredients of each product, especially in case of allergies or skin sensitivity.
section6.text2: is not responsible for adverse reactions resulting from misuse of the products.

section7.title: 7. Intellectual Property
section7.text: All content on this website, including logos, images and texts, is the exclusive property of Ale Beauty Art. Reproduction in whole or in part without prior authorization is prohibited.

section8.title: 8. Changes to the Terms
section8.text: We reserve the right to update these terms and conditions at any time. Changes will take effect from the date they are published on the website.

section9.title: 9. Contact
section9.text: If you have questions about these terms and conditions, you can contact us via email
